Name: engine_assembly
Substrate: block # head # crankshaft # rod # piston # camshaft # valve

Name: assembling_suspension
Substrate: shockabsorbers # controlarm # tensionarm # springs # stabilizers # steeringrack

Name: assembling_seats
Substrate: leather # foam # seatframe # heatingelement # e_motor # switches

Name: assembling_dashboard
Substrate: leather # cluster # radio # climatecontrol # lightswitch # plastic # airvents

Name: assembling_doorpanels
Substrate: leather # plastic # doorlocks # speakers # windows # modules

Name: assembling_headliner
Substrate: carpet # electricroof # alarm # handles # sunvisors # rearviewmirror

Name: assembling_interior
Substrate: parcelshelf # seat # dashboard # doorpanel # headliner # floor

Name: assembling_phase1
Substrate: mainframe # sideframe # roof # drivetrain # subframe # wheels

Name: assembling_phase2
Substrate: rolling_chassis # floor # headliner # dashboard # seats # parcelshelf
